text: Aey eman walo! Apni pakeeza kamaee mein say aur zamin mein say tumharay liye humari nikali hui cheezon mein kharach kero inn mein say buri cheezon kay kharach kerney ka qasad na kerna jissay tum khud lenay walay nahi ho haan agar aankhen band ker lo to aur jaan lo kay Allah Taalaa bey perwah aur khoobiyon wala hai
